p: Fig 4 shows the ranking of the 12 locations examined for each of the three sub-indices separately. There is considerable variation in relative ranking dependent on the sub-index used. For the climate sub-index the most vulnerable locations in order of decreasing vulnerability are located in Jamaica, Belize and Dominican Republic. For the demographic data, the most vulnerable locations in the study are in Barbados, Jamaica and Grenada while for socioeconomic input Guyana, Belize and Jamaica are identified as the most vulnerable. The least vulnerable locations are in Bahamas, Cuba and Grenada for demographic, socioeconomic and climate indicators respectively.
